#summary TPJHandleIStreamWrapper class description.

= TPJHandleIStreamWrapper =

This class provides an _IStream_ interface to any wrapped object of type _THandleStream_ or descendant (such as _TFileStream_) – i.e. any stream based on a Windows file handle. It acts as _[TPJIStreamWrapper]_ except that the _TStatStg_ structure returned by the _Stat_ method also returns information about file creation, modification and access dates where available.

This class has a constructor that only accepts streams that descend from _THandleStream_:

== Methods ==

=== Create ===

Class constructor – creates new _IStream_ wrapper object on the given _THandleStream_.

{{{
constructor Create(const Stream: THandleStream;
  const CloseStream: Boolean = False);
}}}

  * _Stream_ – the wrapped _THandleStream_.
  * _!CloseStream_ – optional parameter that, when true, causes the wrapped stream to be freed when this object is destroyed.
